entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:22 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 late in the evening then light before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
